item.title: Hadoop-Running a cluster-Start and stop HDFS and YARN automatically
item.description: 3 virtual machines were prepated, and JDK, Hadoop have installed and environmental variables have configurated on them. Futhermore, I would like to start and stop cluster manually. So, I need write a script that could start and stop cluster automatically.
